com.whereabout.location
Class LocationManager

java.lang.Object
  com.whereabout.location.LocationManager

public class LocationManager
extends java.lang.Object

Wrapper class for the WifiLocalizationService that makes it look like any other Location provider. Note that this LocationManager is nearly identical to the one in the Android Framework (and it calls up to the one that is in the Android Framework), except for the addition of the INDOOR_WIFI_LOCATION_PROVIDER.

Nested Class Summary
static interface LocationManager.WifiLocalizationListener
          Implement this listener to receive callbacks from the LocationManager.
static interface LocationManager.WifiLocationTaggingListener
          Implement this listener to receive a callback when save operation is done.
 class LocationManager.WifiStorageException

LocationManager

public LocationManager(Context context)
Creates a new LocationManager object setting the root directory to the default value of "/sdcard/wifiscans".

Parameters:
context - The activity context

LocationManager

public LocationManager(Context context,
                       ComponentName wifiService,
                       java.lang.String rootDirPath)
Creates a new LocationManager object setting the root directory to the specified path.

Parameters:
context - The activity context
wifiService - Not used, pass null
rootDirPath - The path to the root directory where tagged WiFi signatures will be saved and read from for localization

getProviders

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getProviders(boolean enabledOnly)
Gets the list of location providers from android.location.LocationManager, adds INDOOR_WIFI_LOCATION_PROVIDER to it, and returns the combined list.

Parameters:
enabledOnly - if true then only the providers which are currently enabled are returned.
Returns:
list of Strings containing names of the providers.

isProviderEnabled

public boolean isProviderEnabled(java.lang.String provider)
Returns the status of INDOOR_WIFI_LOCATION_PROVIDER if requested, otherwise delegates to android.location.LocationManager.

Parameters:
provider - The location provider name.
Returns:
true if the provider is enabled, false otherwise.

removeUpdates

public void removeUpdates(LocationListener listener)
Removes any current registration for location updates of the current activity with the given LocationListener. Following this call, updates will no longer occur for this listener.

Parameters:
listener - LocationListener object that no longer needs location updates.

removeUpdates

public void removeUpdates(PendingIntent intent)
Delegates to android.location.LocationManager.

requestLocationUpdates

public void requestLocationUpdates(java.lang.String provider,
                                   long minTime,
                                   float minDistance,
                                   PendingIntent intent)
Delegates to android.location.LocationManager.

requestLocationUpdates

public void requestLocationUpdates(java.lang.String provider,
                                   long minTime,
                                   float minDistance,
                                   LocationListener listener)
Registers the specified listener to receive location updates. If the provider is INDOOR_WIFI_LOCATION_PROVIDER, minTime and minDistance parameters are ignored, and updates are sent about every 1 second, otherwise delegates to android.location.LocationManager.

Parameters:
provider - The location provider to get updates from.
minTime - Minimum duration in ms between updates. Ignored for INDOOR_WIFI_LOCATION_PROVIDER.
minDistance - Minimum distance between location updates. Ignored for INDOOR_WIFI_LOCATION_PROVIDER.
listener - The LocationListener interested in getting the location updates.

requestLocationUpdates

public void requestLocationUpdates(java.lang.String provider,
                                   long minTime,
                                   float minDistance,
                                   LocationListener listener,
                                   Looper looper)
Delegates to android.location.LocationManager.

sendExtraCommand

public boolean sendExtraCommand(java.lang.String provider,
                                java.lang.String command,
                                Bundle extras)
Sends extra commands to the location provider. This method specifically handles extra commands for the indoor Wifi location provider.

Parameters:
provider - The name of the location provider
command - The command string. Currently only COMMAND_LOAD_FOR is supported for the indoor Wifi location provider. For other providers the call is delegated to android.location.LocationManager
extras - The parameters for the command
Returns:
whether the command was successfully delivered to the location provider

setTestProviderEnabled

public void setTestProviderEnabled(java.lang.String provider,
                                   boolean enabled)
Delegates to android.location.LocationManager.

public void setTestProviderLocation(java.lang.String provider,
                                    Location loc)
Delegates to android.location.LocationManager.

setTestProviderStatus

public void setTestProviderStatus(java.lang.String provider,
                                  int status,
                                  Bundle extras,
                                  long updateTime)
Delegates to android.location.LocationManager.

startWifiService

public void startWifiService()
                      throws LocationManager.WifiStorageException
Starts the WiFi localization service.

Throws:
LocationManager.WifiStorageException - Throws this exception if external storage is not found or not mounted.

shutdown

public void shutdown()
Shuts down this location manager and does the necessary cleanup.

getAllWifiScanLocations

public java.lang.String[] getAllWifiScanLocations()
Returns names of all locations where Wifi scans were taken.

Returns:
An array of location names

getWifiScanLocationsIn

public java.lang.String[] getWifiScanLocationsIn(java.lang.String map,
                                                 java.lang.String prefix)
Returns all locations in the map that matches the regular expression specified and whose names start with the specified prefix.

Parameters:
map - Regular expression for the map in which scans were taken.
prefix - locations starting with this prefix are returned
Returns:
An array of location names

isReady

public boolean isReady()
Indicates whether the service has loaded all data and is ready to receive requests.

Returns:
true if the service is ready, false otherwise

saveScan

public void saveScan(java.lang.String dir,
                     java.lang.String area,
                     java.lang.String building,
                     java.lang.String floor,
                     java.lang.String location,
                     int x,
                     int y,
                     double lat,
                     double lon,
                     int scanFreq,
                     long duration,
                     LocationManager.WifiLocationTaggingListener doneListener)
Asynchronously collects Wifi scans and tags them with the specified meta data.

Parameters:
dir - The directory to save the scan to
area -
building -
floor -
location -
x - X-coordinate of the location on the map image
y - Y-coordinate of the location on the map image
lat - Latitude for this location
lon - Longitude for this location
scanFreq - Number of WiFi scans to take per second
duration - Duration in ms for which to collect WiFi scans

localizeWithWifi

public boolean localizeWithWifi(long scanDuration,
                                LocationManager.WifiLocalizationListener callback)
Provides a way to do on-demand localization using Wifi.

Parameters:
scanDuration - The duration of scanning in ms. It might take more time before results are available since the method takes additional time to wait for the service to be ready and to flush the cached Wifi scans.
callback - The callback listener to call when localization is done.
Returns:
Whether request for localization was successful.

runAccuracyTest

public java.lang.String runAccuracyTest(java.lang.String dir,
                                        java.lang.String file)
This is currently a place-holder for a method that runs accuracy tests that computes sensitivity and specificity by classifying the data stored in the specified directory.

Parameters:
dir - The directory in which test data is stored
file - The tests are ran for the data files starting with this string
Returns:
Returns the specificity and sensitivity formatted as a string "specificity:sensitivity", e.g. "0.85:0.96666"
